text: Lyu Guidi (born 6 May 1993) is a Chinese wheelchair basketball player. She is a member of the China women's national wheelchair basketball team and the Guangdong Province team. She won the silver medal at the 2020 Summer Paralympics, and the gold medal at the 2018 Asian Para Games. At the 2018, Women's World Wheelchair Basketball Championship she finished fourth and at the 2016 Summer Paralympics sixth. She began with wheelchair basketball when, she was 20 years old in Guangdong. == References == == Other websites == * Guidi Lyu of Team China shoots against Charlotte Moore... title: Lyu Guidi
